pages.text: aejabu l'ilf qrysh, wamnhm, wastqamt msalhhm, wantzam rhltyhm fi alshita' 'iilaa "alymn", wafi alsayf 'iilaa "alsham", wtysyr dhlk; lijalb ma yhtajwn 'ilyh
aejabu l'ilf qrysh, wamnhm, wastqamt msalhhm, wantzam rhltyhm fi alshita' 'iilaa "alymn", wafi alsayf 'iilaa "alsham", wtysyr dhlk; lijalb ma yhtajwn 'ilyh
flyshkru, wlyebdu rabi hdha albayt -whw alkebt- aldhy shrfu bh, wlywhdwh wykhlsu lah alebadt
aldhy 'ateamahum min jue shdyd, wamanahum min fuzie wkhwf ezym
arayt hal dhlk aladhi ykdhdhib balbeth waljza'?
fdhlk aldhy yadfae alyatim bieunf wshdt ean hqh; lqsawt qlbh
wla yhdd ghyrh ealaa 'iiteam almskyn, fkyf lah 'an yateamuh bnfsh?
fedhab shadid lilmusaliyn aladhin hum ean salatihim lahwn, la yqymwnha ealaa wjhha, wala ywdwnha fi wqtha
fedhab shadid lilmusaliyn aladhin hum ean salatihim lahwn, la yqymwnha ealaa wjhha, wala ywdwnha fi wqtha
aldhyn hum yatazaharun bi'aemal alkhayr mra'at llnas
wymnewn 'ieart ma la tadura 'iearth min alanyt wghyrha, fala hum 'ahsanuu eibadat rbhm, wala hum 'ahsanuu 'iilaa khlqh
'ina 'aetaynak -ayha alnby- alkhayr alkthyr fi aldunya walakhrt, wamin dhlk nahr alkawthar fi aljanat aldhy haftah khyam alluwlu almjwwaf, wtynh almsk
fakhls lirabik salatak klha, wadhbh dhbyhtk lah waealaa aismuh whdh
'in mbghdk wmbghd ma jit bih min alhudaa walnwr, hu almnqte athrh, almqtwe min kuli khyr
